attributes.title: Needs MAJOR improvements
attributes.review: I wanted to support but this app is so bad. It needs major improvements. Download time is extremely slow. It constantly freezes. When  it isn‚Äôt frozen it automatically shuts down. And takes a long time to reload when I have to re-open the app. The graphics are blurry and pixelated. There is no options to turn the music down. The app shuts off when you try. The interface is very complicated and not user friendly at all. Not great.

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!
attributes.review: This app is awful, it took weeks, maybe even MONTHS TO DOWNLOAD!! It was awful quality, glitched every second, and it was sooo boring. There were ads almost every 5 seconds, and the app was overall so confusing. it put inappropriate things, and was ugly. there was inappropriate ads that i wouldnt even let 15 year olds watch. the app put false information and things that were so wrong it was hard to even LOOK AT! remove this app from the app store i dont want anyone to go through the same pain as me..
